name: Don't touch me, I am scared
name_original: Don't touch me, I am scared
description:
_MEMO for exploration space vessel B52__

It seems that we have finally discovered an intelligent life form on your ship, other than you of course :).

But it for some reason doesn't want to talk to us, how strange.

Well, we have the means to make it talk to us. That's why you are here, our trusted unpaid intern 146.

Would you be so kind and help us in that manner. Go and catch it.

To help you with this task we have given you a partial authority over your leg movement (wasd) and authority to temporarily close one door every few steps (just click on them).

Please note that there have been some leaks of chilling fluid. We don't know what will that do to, consider yourself warned.

Don't disappoint us,

Experimental Department for Cultivating Samples

STPD et SPX M. Pot

This game was made on GDS gameJam 2021 by:

Tomáš Jakubec

Jan Nekarda

Tereza Kadlečková

Tomáš Plhák
